entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
